query: Tech Lead backend with C1 English and mentoring experience
positive: Backend Engineer (Senior/Lead): 10+ years experience, team mentoring, architecture guidance, English C1
negative: Frontend Engineer: <5 years experience, React/Next.js stack, UI-focused responsibilities, English B2

query: Senior .NET engineer with experience in microservices and Azure
positive: Backend Engineer (Senior): 10+ years experience, .NET Core, microservices architecture, Azure cloud platform
negative: Data Scientist: 5+ years experience, Python stack, machine learning and NLP focus

query: Backend .NET with experience in EF Core and SQL Server
positive: Backend Engineer: 5+ years experience, Entity Framework Core, SQL Server optimization and data access patterns
negative: Backend Engineer: Python/Django stack, PostgreSQL database, no .NET ecosystem

query: Senior C# developer with CI/CD in Azure DevOps
positive: Backend Engineer (Senior): CI/CD automation, Azure DevOps pipelines, code quality tooling, high test coverage
negative: Backend Engineer: Jenkins-based CI/CD, PHP/Laravel stack

positive: Backend Engineer (Architect): Domain-Driven Design, tactical and strategic patterns, CQRS, event-driven architecture
negative: Backend Engineer: Spring Boot monolith, non event-driven architecture

query: Backend engineer with experience in messaging (RabbitMQ/Kafka)
positive: Backend Engineer: Asynchronous messaging patterns, consumers, retry logic, dead-letter queues
negative: Backend Engineer: REST API-only architecture, no asynchronous queuing

query: .NET developer with experience in JWT and OAuth2 authentication
positive: Backend Engineer: JWT tokens, refresh token patterns, OAuth2 PKCE flows
negative: Backend Engineer: Session-based authentication, cookie-based approach

query: Backend .NET with experience in automated testing (xUnit)
positive: Backend Engineer: xUnit testing, mock-based tests, test pyramid strategy, contract testing
negative: QA Professional: Manual and exploratory testing, no automated unit tests

query: Senior .NET with experience in distributed caching (Redis)
positive: Backend Engineer (Senior): Redis distributed caching, key design patterns, expiration strategies
negative: Backend Engineer: In-memory caching only, local application cache

query: .NET engineer with experience in high-performance APIs
positive: Backend Engineer: API performance optimization, runtime tuning, memory pooling, benchmarking
negative: Backend Engineer: Standard CRUD APIs, no performance optimization focus

query: Backend with experience in structured logging and observability
positive: Backend Engineer: Structured logging, OpenTelemetry integration, distributed tracing, metrics collection
negative: Backend Engineer: Basic console logging, minimal observability

query: Senior .NET with container deployments and Kubernetes
positive: Backend Engineer (Senior): Multi-stage container builds, Kubernetes orchestration, Helm charts, health probes
negative: Backend Engineer: IIS on-premises deployments, monolithic servers

query: .NET + Azure Functions for real-time event processing
positive: Backend Engineer: Serverless architecture, Azure Functions, event-driven triggers, durable functions
negative: Backend Engineer: Scheduled Windows Services, periodic batch processing

query: Backend .NET with payments integration and PCI-like security
positive: Backend Engineer: Payment integrations, tokenization, secure hashing, secret rotation, compliance practices
negative: Backend Engineer: E-commerce carts and orders, standard security without payment compliance

query: Staff .NET with technical leadership and effective code reviews
positive: Backend Engineer (Staff): Technical governance, architecture guidance, code review standards, mentoring
negative: Individual Contributor: Technical execution only, no leadership or architecture involvement
